item.description:
October is a busy month for me as its Halloween Month! So only think I will be able to host one Meetup this month.

Lets see if we can't get some Halloween/Horror games on the table tonight.

I have looked into other nights/days and should be able to do gaming on nights other than Thursdays soon. Look for announcements.

Join us for some gaming on a Thursday evening. We will figure out from choices of a few games what one to play. Please only RSVP yes if you are going to attend. Hope to see some of you there. Questions please let me know.

group.name: The Portsmouth, NH / Seacoast Boardgames Group

item.name: Thursday Spooktacular Gaming!
